value.description: The selected value in the drop-down (or null for uncontrolled drop-down box)

values.description: The list of values for the drop-down

valueFn.description: An optional function to convert the list item to a string value in <option>

textFn.description: An optional function to convert the list item to a string value to for display

defaultText.description: Default text to show when values is not defined
